These XML files are intended for programming into the various Staribus Instrument EEPROMs.

For RS232/485 controllers, don't forget to change the <StaribusAddress> field
to correspond with the addresses you require on your system.

It is not necessary to change the <IPAddress> field on Ethernet controllers.

Use the Core.setModuleConfiguration() command.

The Controller is Module 0.

The Primary Plugin is Module 1.

Please report any problems to:
starbase@ukraa.com

L M Newell
2011-10-10
